                                          Will CheN

                                          Contact Phone: 425.409.7915

                                          Term Expires: 12/31/25

                                          Committee A (1st Tuesday)

                                          2025 COUNCIL LIAISON ASSIGNMENTS:

                                          LEOFF 1 Disability Board
